name: sanrest
description: A RESTful API that describes the web services and the operations for the report files of iSanXoT

scripts.start: forever start -p "$INIT_CWD" -l logs/sanrest.log -o logs/sanrest.log -e logs/sanrest.err   server.js
scripts.restart: forever restart -p "$INIT_CWD" -l logs/sanrest.log -o logs/sanrest.log -e logs/sanrest.err   server.js
scripts.start.win: forever start -p "%INIT_CWD%" -l logs/sanrest.log -o logs/sanrest.log -e logs/sanrest.err   server.js
scripts.restart.win: forever restart -p "%INIT_CWD%" -l logs/sanrest.log -o logs/sanrest.log -e logs/sanrest.err   server.js

author: jmrodriguezc@cnic.es
